text: I was tired today but math class was kind of fun.
School was boring but nothing really bad happened.
I felt nervous before the quiz but it went fine.
I like hanging out with my friends after school.
Today was normal, just a regular day.
I feel tired all the time and don’t really want to talk to anyone.
Nothing really makes me excited lately.
I get stressed every time I think about school.
I feel like I mess things up a lot.
I feel lonely even when people are around.
I’ve been angry a lot and don’t know why.
Sometimes I don’t want to be here anymore.
I feel like nobody would care if I disappeared.
I can’t do this anymore, everything feels too heavy.
I think about hurting myself when things get bad.
